howToConvert.title: How to convert PNG to WEBP files
howToConvert.description: We made our file converter to be as easy to use as possible. Converting your PNG to a JPG file involves three steps:

steps.description: Upload your PNG: Click upload to choose a file from your computer, or drag your file into the dropzone above.
Click ‘Convert to WEBP’: This converts your file from JPG to WEBP.
Download your document: Your download will start automatically, or you can click to download your file.

whyConvert.title: Why convert PNG to WEBP files
paragraphs: Our PNG to WEBP online file converter converts web-based images when smaller file sizes and faster loading times are crucial to your workflow. Converting your PNG to a WEBP file can optimize your cloud storage by compressing files up to 34% without compromising file quality.
PNG to WEBP conversion is becoming a popular method because of its capabilities for faster loading times on websites and reduced data usage.
